alert.note: Alert for Leon; Limestone (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 02 at 5:54PM CDT until April 02 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN FREESTONE...WEST CENTRAL LEON AND EAST CENTRAL LIMESTONE COUNTIES... At 553 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located 9 miles east southeast of Thornton on FM 1246, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Lake Limestone around 605 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Box Church, Farrar, Donie, Freestone, Oletha and Jewett. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
